UserSettingsForm.genderOneOf: Gender can be only woman or man
UserSettingsForm.nameMax: Name should not be longer than 70 characters
UserSettingsForm.weightMin: Weight should not be less than 10 kg
UserSettingsForm.weightMax: Weight should not be more than 250 kg
UserSettingsForm.timeTypeError: Activity number must be a number
UserSettingsForm.timeMin: Activity time cannot be negative number
UserSettingsForm.timeMax: Activity time cannot be more than 12 hours for day
UserSettingsForm.normTypeError: Daily water norm must be a number
UserSettingsForm.normMin: Water norm should be more than 0 L
UserSettingsForm.normMax: Water norm should not be more than 10 L for day
UserSettingsForm.name: Your name
UserSettingsForm.description: V is the volume of the water norm in liters per day, M is your body weight, T is the time of active sports, or another type of activity commensurate in terms of loads (in the absence of these, you must set 0)
UserSettingsForm.activity: The time of active participation in sports:
UserSettingsForm.amount: The required amount of water in liters per day:
UserSettingsForm.drink: Write down how much water you will drink:

WaterModal.secondTitle: Edit the entered amount of water

WaterForm.waterValueMin: The value must be at least 50 ml
WaterForm.waterValueMax: The value must be at most 1500 ml
WaterForm.waterValuePositive: The number must be a positive value
WaterForm.addSuccess: The amount of water consumed has been added successfully.
WaterForm.editSuccess: The amount of water consumed has been successfully updated.
WaterForm.error: Failed to save water data. Please try again.
WaterForm.title: Amount of water:
WaterForm.value: Enter the value of the water used:

Reactour.step1: Alright, let`s start the tour of Aqua Track!
Reactour.step2: Here you can see your daily water intake.
Reactour.step3: And here you can track your progress in water consumption.
Reactour.step4: Here you will be able to see the cards of water consumed throughout the day after adding it. The cards can be edited and deleted.
Reactour.step5: And with the help of this button, you can add the amount of water consumed and set the time of this event.
Reactour.step6: Here you can edit your personal information.
Reactour.step7: In the calendar, you can see the progress of water consumption for each day.
Reactour.step8: We wish you get the most satisfaction from using our app!
